columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the DB parameter group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB parameter group.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Provides the customer-specified description for this DB parameter group.

columns.name: db_parameter_group_family
columns.description: The name of the DB parameter group family that this DB parameter group is compatible with.

columns.name: parameters
columns.description: A list of detailed parameter for a particular DB parameter group.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the DB parameter group.
